input.original_section:
**Strategic Initiatives and Projects**

**Enterprise-Wide Lean Manufacturing Transformation Program**
Executive Sponsor and Program Lead, 2019 - 2022
Directed comprehensive operational excellence initiative across 8 manufacturing facilities employing 2,400 workers with goal of improving productivity and reducing waste. Led program team of 35 continuous improvement specialists, plant managers, and engineers implementing value stream mapping, 5S workplace organization, and kaizen events across all production lines. Initiative involved training 1,800 employees in lean principles and establishing daily management systems for problem solving. Program utilized visual management boards, standardized work procedures, and statistical process control methods. Results included 44% reduction in manufacturing lead times from 18 days to 10 days, improvement in overall equipment effectiveness from 67% to 89%, and elimination of $52M in annual waste across inventory, scrap, and rework. Project completed 3 months ahead of 36-month timeline and recognized with industry Shingo Prize for operational excellence.

**Multi-Site Distribution Network Consolidation and Automation Project**
Executive Owner, 2020 - 2023
Oversaw strategic redesign of distribution network consolidating 11 regional warehouses into 5 automated fulfillment centers with investment of $85M in facility construction and material handling systems. Project reduced distribution operating costs by $28M annually while improving order fulfillment speed by 38%. Implementation included installation of automated storage and retrieval systems, conveyor networks, and warehouse management software supporting 3,500 daily shipments.
